resources.string: I-Mzansi Lingo iyisicelo sokufunda ulimi esisebenza kumakhalekhukhwini, esihlanganisa injabulo yokufunda negugu lezilimi ezihlukene zaseNingizimu Afrika. Sinikeza izifundo ezilimini eziyisikhombisa ezisemthethweni zaseNingizimu Afrika: isiZulu, isiXhosa, Sesotho, Setswana, Sepedi, isi-Afrikaans, nesiNgisi.

Uhlelo lwethu luhlanganisa ukufunda okufana nomdlalo, ukuzizwisa isiko, nezivivinyo zokukhuluma ezisebenzayo ukusiza abasebenzisi bakhe ulwazi lwegama, uhlelo lolimi, namakhono enkulumo. Sakhelwe izakhamuzi kanye nezivakashi, sikhuthaza ukusebenzisa izilimi eziningi nokuxhumana kwamasiko kulo lonke elaseNingizimu Afrika.

Izilaleli zethu eziyinhloko zihlanganisa izakhamuzi zaseNingizimu Afrika, abavakashi, abahlali bangaphandle, nabafundi abanentshisekelo yokufunda izilimi zasemakhaya ukuze bathuthukise isiko, ukukhula komsebenzi, noma ukuxhumana komuntu siqu. Samukela wonke umuntu onentshisekelo ngezilimi namasiko aseNingizimu Afrika.

üéÆ Ukufunda Okusekelwe Kumdlalo: Imiklomelo emnandi njengamaphuzu, ama-badge, nezinhlekelele kwenza ukufunda kujabulise futhi kudonsele ngendlela enhle.

üèÜ Amabhodi Abaholi & Ukubekwa Kwezinga: Qhathanisa inqubekela yakho nabangani nabanye abafundi ukukhuthaza umfutho nomoya womphakathi.

üìÖ Izinhloso Zansuku Zonke & Izikhumbuzo: Beka izinhloso zansuku zonke futhi uthole izikhumbuzo zokwakha imikhuba yokufunda ethembekile naphezu kwezimiso ezimatasatasa.

üìö Uhlelo Lolimi & Amazinga Okwazi: Izifundo ziyaqhubeka kusukela kwabaqalayo kuya kwabaphezulu ngezinyathelo ezicacile, zakha ukuzethemba futhi kwenze inqubekela phambili ilula ukulandelela.

üó£Ô∏è Ukufunda Okugxile Ekukhulumeni: Imisebenzi yokukhuluma, ukuhlola ukuphimisa, nezingxoxo ze-AI zithuthukisa ukuzethemba kokukhuluma kwangempela, hhayi nje igama.

üåç Ukuhlanganiswa Kwamasiko: Funda izilimi ngokwesimo sazo samasiko ukuze uthole ukuqonda okujulile nokwazisa.

I-rhinoceros yethu eluhlaza enobungane emele umoya waseNingizimu Afrika. Ngamehlo amakhulu ayindilinga, ukumamatheka okujabulisayo, nempondo ezimhlophe, i-mascot yethu ye-rhino imela ubuntu obufinyelelekayo nobumnandi bokufunda ulimi ngesikhathi ixhuma nobunikazi baseNingizimu Afrika.

Sibona iNingizimu Afrika lapho imigoqo yolimi iyizibuko zokuqonda, lapho lonke isakhamuzi singaxhumana phakathi kwezehlukaniso zamasiko, futhi lapho ukuhluka kwethu kwezilimi kuba amandla ethu amakhulu. Ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe nokusungula, senza ukufunda ulimi kufinyeleleke kuwo wonke umuntu.
